text: 1/2 teaspoon dried herbs (such as herbs de provence or dried oregano)
label: ingredient

text: Season the chicken with the juice of 1/2 of the lemon, then season with remaining spices on both sides.
label: step

text: Rub the seasoning well all over the chicken then transfer to the air fryer, skin side down.
label: step

text: Air fry 400F 12 minutes on each side, until golden and crispy and cooked through in the center.
label: step
